Instructions for how to upgrade various third party javascript libraries.

== jqGrid

http://www.trirand.com/blog/?page_id=6

Select all the following checkboxes:

* jqGrid
* Formatter
* Additional methods
* Grouping
* Importing and exporting
* XML and json
* Additional methods using jquery-ui


== jQuery-ui

1. Open the jquery-ui.css file in this project
2. Go to the huge link under the text "To view and modify this theme, visit"
3. Press "download" on that page.
4. Untick the following modules:

* Accordian
* Slider
* All the effects except core, highlight, pulsate and shake
